BIO

My name is Emmanuel Enebeli(koko_codes) and am a small time boy with big dreams i have an undying passion to thrive in the tech space.
Am a student of petroleum training institute studying computer science and have little knowledge in javascript and algorithm. The only time i feel free in my life is when am in my workspace and coding, i may not be the smartest person and my whole life have gotten alot of no from people. But coding has never rejected me and has always welcomed me with opened hands no matter who i was or where i was from, i always tell myself that all i need is a notepad and the world will becom my canvas I aspire to fix stuff, help the world become more open and connected and also be recognized.
